TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: A Small Jump for a Kerbale

Articles.Content: T0mR0b1n created a vector animation in which he takes us through a flight in Kerbal Space Program in his own style. The resulting video has great quality and has a unique artstyle to it. A well deserved feature!

Glad that this video made it here! I watched it a while back and was overly impressed with the quality of the video. I want to extend my good wishes to T0mR0b1n again, to continue to create these fantastic videos!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

During the whole time I was watching this view, I thought to myself... "made in Gimp right?" ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Also, I find the new "Add Music" button for YouTube to be very useful. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I'm still surprised it wasn't a Rick Roll.

> 
> I'm still surprised it wasn't a Rick Roll.

Too many good deserving videos to waste a week on silliness.

It occurs to me that this graphics type would make an interesting 2D take on KSP for tablets and phones.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T15:08:08Z" title="04/02/2015 03:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by Alshain**

> 
> A Kerbal or a Kerbale?

It would be the french word fo a she-Kerbal.
right here, right now! right here, right now!
Purely simple and simply pure. I liked it.
This is an awesomely made video!

So I guess we don't get weekly post any more. Dev Notes late on Tuesday and that's it. It's now Friday. Ah I'm so bored. I need new and fresh content to read and watch now I'm looking after the kids full time.
